subject: Speedskating
World Cup (Skiing)
Cross-Country Skiing
Nordic Combined (Winter Sport Event)
lead_paragraph: Brittany Bowe beat her teammate Heather Richardson to win the 1,000-meter event at a speedskating World Cup meet in Berlin.
snippet: Brittany Bowe beat her teammate Heather Richardson to win the 1,000-meter event at a speedskating World Cup meet in Berlin.
